subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: For the first time in weeks, LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh are all expected to be in the starting lineup Saturday for Game 1 against the Knicks.
snippet: For the first time in weeks, LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh are all expected to be in the starting lineup Saturday for Game 1 against the Knicks.
